text: Bernard Szczęsny (27 October 1919 – 19 December 1993), was an activist of the Kashubians and Pomeranians (ethnic groups in northern Poland). He was born in Berlin and was the president of Kashubian-Pomeranian Association in years 1959–1971. Category:1919 births Category:1993 deaths Category:People from Berlin Category:Place of birth missing
title: Bernard Szczęsny
